fullText: This new 'Camelot' doesn't quite achieve the impossible dream of its legendary predecessor, but it succeeds in making Lerner and Loewe's score feel vital again.
dtliExcerpt: This new 'Camelot' doesn't quite achieve the impossible dream of its legendary predecessor, but it succeeds in making Lerner and Loewe's score feel vital again.
